solution_line_template: Mona joined {num_groups} groups, so she played with {num_groups} * {players_per_group} = <<{num_groups}*{players_per_group}={total_player_instances}>>{total_player_instances} people.
Thus, she played with {total_player_instances} - {total_re_grouped_instances} = <<{total_player_instances}-{total_re_grouped_instances}={unique_players}>>{unique_players} unique players that weekend.
